<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/counts/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Recalculates per-user view counts used by the UI for badges or summary totals. Call this after large data changes or when counts appear stale to refresh the cached totals.

**Prerequisites**
- None. Authentication determines which user's counts are updated.

**Workflow Example**
1. Trigger recalculation: [GET /api/v1.0/views/counts/update](/docs/api/views/update-view-counts).
2. Re-fetch view lists (for example, [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views)) to see updated counts.

**Minimal Required Fields**: none.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
